title: Moonlight In Hanalei
description: When Ellie moves to Hawaii, all she wants to do is keep her head down, lay low, and live a simple life. She’d never considered that people would actually want to get to know her. Can Ellie survive flying under the radar? Or will the handsome fireman douse her fire and bring everything to light?Kona is the Captain at the local fire station. A town hero to most, dashingly handsome to all. Ellie intrigues him and he won’t stop until he’s figured her out.Can Ellie finally find the love and family she’s always yearned for? Or will her past come back to haunt her?
author: Nalani Titcomb
